page.title: 17Accident Blackspot - Two
page.content: There have been so many accidents involving vehicles crossing from one side to the other and hitting traffic going in the opposite direction that there are now many more stretches with crash barriers on the central reservation. The volume of transport on the road apparently does not warrant making it up to Motorway standard. The road is so dangerous that school children have to be transported across it to school even though the distance may be quite short. The long straight stretch of road at Johnstonebridge invites drivers to speed especially those driving large lorries.
